name: Age of Space (itch)
description:
Sci-Fi RTS made in 24 hours.

  • Planets procedurally generated 
  • 3 types of unit
  • 9 types of buildings

Controls:

- Movement: WASD or Arrows.

- Camera rotation: Hold middle mouse button.

- Zoom: Mouse wheel.

- Left mouse button on planets to open the build panel.

- Left mouse button on a built hangar (UI) to open the recruitment panel.

- Left mouse button on a unit to select, or multiple selection holding left mouse button and moving the mouse. Once selected, right mouse button to move them.

- Escape to open the pause menu.

Music:

The Descent by Kevin MacLeod
